---------------------------------------------------------------------
To those who have never heard these rare live performances from 1969 
before, I just want to mention that the sound quality of the recordings varies 
from really bad to truly horrific. But it IS King Crimson live, the original lineup 
at that. So, take a couple of aspirin, and enjoy.  :)  Oh, and the above track listing is all screwed up, but the files themselves are labeled correctly

The collected live recordings and rarities from the band that started it all for 
art-rock back in 1969. This 4 volume set includes the final performance by 
Fripp, 
Lake, McDonald, Giles and Sinfield at the Fillmore West in San Francisco plus 
studio sessions recorded at the BBC.

BBC Radio Sessions

2. In The Court of the Crimson King
3. Get Thy Bearings
4. Epitaph
